item.title: Understanding CIDR Block and IPv4 Addressing
item.description: Big Idea The goal of this post will be to give an overview of how IPv4 addresses. My goal is to incrementally cover three main topics so that you can better understand IPv4 networking. First, I will go over the parts of an IPv4 address, Second I will review how to convert between base 10 and binary representations and IPv4 addressed, Third, I will delve into how CIDR blocks and subnet masks are used for subnetting network.
